reviewText: Lame. Some amateur with a camcorder at spring break. Not impressive

This dvd is very tame compared to other items available out there. I'm sure you've heard it on the news. Japanese women complaining to police that they are being groped on trains and molested in public. The link below is absolutely overflowing with such dvds. There are groping dvds, dvds of women's skirt being blown up by the wind from nature and trains. Women's skirts being pulled up in public and panties pulled down to their knees, dvds of women's tops being pulled down in crowded cities by what they call "fiends" exposing their breasts and so much more. [...]

Ok Im gona get flamed here for this, but BSB (Black Spring Break) is a much more different animal than WSP (White Spring Break). I mean the girls parade themselves around in the finest of ho gear (its a good thing, cause Im a man!) and if you're  female and you go to BSB, DO NOT walk on the sidewalk between the guys. You will get groped and grabbed. Its amazing, as the guys never get slapped!. when a lady comes down the walk, the guys clear out, and then begin to ask her name, age, shoe size, whatever. Then the grabbing! Its almost hilarious (but wrong, for all you feminists) how the guys just go after what they like, dat AZZ! But the girls are dressed so provacativly and most don't even shy away from the touching. Its a meat market at its finest and quite low-brow at that, but its a hoot to watch. Still not enough hands on for me, and the cameraman needs to learn some skills, but a good one to watch for a few minutes with ya boys.
